file.name: draft.yml
file.content:
---
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  version: v1.2
  title: Apply API
  contact:
    name: DfE
    email: becomingateacher@digital.education.gov.uk
  description: |
    API for DfEâ€™s Apply for teacher training service.
    Endpoints with the `/applications` prefix are considered stable.
    Experimental endpoints prefixed with `/test-data` may change or be removed.
servers:
- description: Sandbox (test environment for vendors)
  url: https://sandbox.apply-for-teacher-training.service.gov.uk/api/v1.1
- description: Production
  url: https://www.apply-for-teacher-training.service.gov.uk/api/v1.1
paths:
  "/applications/{application_id}/reject-by-codes":
    post:
      tags:
      - Application decision workflow
      summary: Reject an application with reasons codes
      description: |
        Rejects the application.
        Reasons for rejection can be stated as multiple codes with an optional description.
      parameters:
      - "$ref": "#/components/parameters/application_id"
      requestBody:
        description: Reasons for rejection
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              required:
                - meta
                - data
              properties:
                data:
                  type: array
                  items:
                    "$ref": "#/components/schemas/RejectionReason"
                meta:
                  "$ref": "#/components/schemas/MetaData"
      responses:
        '200':
          description: An application
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                "$ref": "#/components/schemas/SingleApplicationResponse"
        '401':
          "$ref": "#/components/responses/Unauthorized"
        '404':
          "$ref": "#/components/responses/NotFound"
        '422':
          "$ref": "#/components/responses/UnprocessableEntity"
  "/reference-data/rejection-reason-codes":
    get:
      tags:
      - Reference data
      responses:
        '200':
          description: An array of possible rejection reason codes and rejection reason descriptions.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                "$ref": "#/components/schemas/ObjectListResponse"
components:
  schemas:
    ObjectListResponse:
      type: object
      required:
      - data
      properties:
        data:
          type: array
          items:
            type: object
            properties:
              code:
                type: string
                example: R01
              label:
                type: string
                example: Qualifications
              default_details:
                type: string
                example: You did not have the required or relevant qualifications, or we could not find record of your qualifications.
    RejectionReason:
      type: object
      description: Reason for rejection denoted by code and optional details.
      additionalProperties: false
      required:
      - code
      properties:
        code:
          type: string
          description: The code denoting a specific reason for rejection.
          example: R08
        details:
          type: string
          description: Optional details about why the application was rejected for the given reason.
          example: You did not attend any of the arranged interviews.
          maxLength: 65535

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: path "/applications/{application_id}/reject-by-codes": post: parameters: parse parameter "": at 1:1475: can't find value for "components/parameters/application_id"
